subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Martina Hingis and Lleyton Hewitt, who both breezed through the first round on Tuesday, are trying less to recapture their past than to keep pace with their future.
snippet: Martina Hingis and Lleyton Hewitt, who both breezed through the first round on Tuesday, are trying less to recapture their past than to keep pace with their future.
